page.title: 20 Population 2
page.content:
We also asked people where they were born. Only 20% of the people who answered the questionnaire were born in Tamworth 52% were born in Birmingham.
On the questionnaire we also asked for opinions on the future expansion of Tamworth.DOES TAMWORTH NEED ANY MORE: % HOUSES 2 SHOPS 49 SPORTS CENTRES 63 HOSPITALS 84 PARKS 63 LIBRARIES 31
Most people interviewed felt that Tamworth has enough houses. most people thought that there was an urgent need for more hospitals and that there were not enough parks or sports facilities.
